revised_title: Combinatory Method for Regular Mixtures in Statistical Mechanics
tldr: The authors apply the combinatory method, a more accurate treatment in statistical mechanics, to regular mixtures. They use this method to analyze pairs of sites, groups of three sites forming equilateral triangles, and groups of four sites forming regular tetrahedra on a close-packed lattice. The study provides a better understanding of the energy of mixing and the configurational free energy in regular mixtures.
